title: Set a custom product image for the newly added ₹199 product

requirements.text: Generate a new custom square product image for the newly added product priced at INR ₹199.00 (19900 paise). Add the image file under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and ensure it is suitable as a storefront product thumbnail (clean, readable, kid-friendly worksheets style).
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/kids-worksheets-199.dim_400x400.png`.
The image is 400x400 and visually appropriate as a product thumbnail (no stretched aspect ratio, no tiny unreadable text).

requirements.text: Update the seeded/demo data (Demo Data Seeder) so the INR ₹199.00 product uses the new custom image via `ExternalBlob.fromURL('/assets/generated/kids-worksheets-199.dim_400x400.png')` in its `images` array.
acceptanceCriteria: After running the demo seeder on a fresh state, the ₹199.00 product appears in the Shop and Product Detail pages with the new custom image as its primary image.
The product image renders via `ExternalBlob.getDirectURL()` without errors, and no placeholder image is shown for the ₹199.00 product.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.

Do not edit files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose instead of editing).
All newly generated images must be shipped as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and loaded directly by the frontend (no backend image routing).
nonGoals: Do not add new products or change product pricing (the request is only to set a custom image).
Do not introduce new authentication methods beyond Internet Identity.

required: Kid-friendly worksheets bundle cover illustration with simple icons (pencils, letters, numbers) on a clean light background (kids-worksheets-199.dim_400x400.png)
